headline: Scott Bessent Worries About A Lot Of Things But The Indian Rupee Emerging As A BRICS Rival To Dollar Isn't One Of Them: Here's Why
summary: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent isn’t losing sleep over the Indian Rupee challenging the U.S. Dollar’s dominance as a global reserve currency. Not Worried About ‘The Rupee’ Becoming A Reserve Currency On Thursday, in a post on X, Shashank ...
